/opt/homebrew/bin/mpicxx  -arch arm64 -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names "CMakeFiles/Ball-Drop.dir/Ball-Drop.cc.o" -o Ball-Drop   -L/opt/homebrew/Caskroom/miniconda/base/envs/Akantu/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/Caskroom/miniconda/base/envs/Akantu/lib -lakantu -liohelper /opt/homebrew/Cellar/gcc/15.2.0/lib/gcc/current/libgomp.dylib
